sn46.4:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn46.4:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
sn46.4:1.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
sn46.4:2.3: Satisambojjhango, dhammavicayasambojjhango, viriyasambojjhango, pitisambojjhango, passaddhisambojjhango, samadhisambojjhango, upekkhasambojjhango—
sn46.4:2.5: Imesam khvaham, avuso, sattannam bojjhanganam yena yena bojjhangena akankhami pubbanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena pubbanhasamayam viharami;
sn46.4:2.6: yena yena bojjhangena akankhami majjhanhikam samayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena majjhanhikam samayam viharami;
sn46.4:2.7: yena yena bojjhangena akankhami sayanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena sayanhasamayam viharami.
sn46.4:2.8: Satisambojjhango iti ce me, avuso, hoti, ‘appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti, titthantanca nam ‘titthati’ti pajanami.
sn46.4:2.9: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami …pe…
sn46.4:2.10: upekkhasambojjhango iti ce me, avuso, hoti, ‘appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti, titthantanca nam ‘titthati’ti pajanami.
sn46.4:2.11: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami.
sn46.4:3.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, ranno va rajamahamattassa va nanarattanam dussanam dussakarandako puro assa.
sn46.4:3.2: So yannadeva dussayugam akankheyya pubbanhasamayam parupitum, tam tadeva dussayugam pubbanhasamayam parupeyya;
sn46.4:3.3: yannadeva dussayugam akankheyya majjhanhikam samayam parupitum, tam tadeva dussayugam majjhanhikam samayam parupeyya;
sn46.4:3.4: yannadeva dussayugam akankheyya sayanhasamayam parupitum, tam tadeva dussayugam sayanhasamayam parupeyya.
sn46.4:3.5: Evameva khvaham, avuso, imesam sattannam bojjhanganam yena yena bojjhangena akankhami pubbanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena pubbanhasamayam viharami;
sn46.4:3.6: yena yena bojjhangena akankhami majjhanhikam samayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena majjhanhikam samayam viharami;
sn46.4:3.7: yena yena bojjhangena akankhami sayanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena sayanhasamayam viharami.
sn46.4:3.8: Satisambojjhango iti ce me, avuso, hoti, ‘appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti, titthantanca nam ‘titthati’ti pajanami.
sn46.4:3.9: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami …pe…
sn46.4:3.10: upekkhasambojjhango iti ce me, avuso, hoti, ‘appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti, titthantanca nam ‘titthati’ti pajanami.
sn46.4:3.11: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami”ti.
